summary: A unique documentary on the notorious S-21 prison, today the Tuol Sleng Genocide Museum in Phnom Penh, Cambodia, with testimony by the only surviving prisoners and former Khmer Rouge guards.
cast: Khieu 'Poev' Ches|Yeay Cheu|Nhem En|Houy Him|Ta Him|Nhieb Ho|Prakk Kahn|Peng Kry|Som Meth|Chum Mey|Vann Nath|Top Pheap|Tcheam Seur|Sours Thi|Mak Thim
title: S21: La máquina roja de matar
